title: 15-Year-Old Killed in Inglewood Shooting
content:
KNBC-TV
After a 15-year-old boy was shot and killed in Inglewood Wednesday night, authorities were looking for the person responsible Thursday.
The Inglewood Police Department a call around 11:41 p.m. Wednesday, and found the victim on 4200 block of West 103 Street in Inglewood with at least one gunshot wound, according to the Inglewood Police Department.
Brandon Lopez, an Inglewood resident, died at the hospital, coroner’s Assistant Chief Ed Winter said.
Detectives are investigating the shooting. Anyone with information is asked to call Inglewood police at 310-412-5246.
Copyright City News Service
